abstract: An updated version of the jet, with lightweight carbon-composite wings and the potential to cut fuel usage by 20 percent, is being pitched to airlines and leasing companies.
snippet: An updated version of the jet, with lightweight carbon-composite wings and the potential to cut fuel usage by 20 percent, is being pitched to airlines and leasing companies.
lead_paragraph: Boeing’s sales force is starting to pitch airlines and jet leasing companies on an updated, larger version of its 777 passenger jet, a crucial step toward winning approval from Boeing’s board to build the plane, Boeing officials said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Boeing Moves to Upgrade Popular 777 Passenger Jet
headline.print_headline: Boeing Moves to Upgrade Popular 777 Passenger Jet
